mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.activity_num activityNum, a.hotel_id hotelId, a.begin_time beginTime, a.end_time endTime, a.available_time availableTime, a.restriction_enable restrictionEnable, a.restriction_number restrictionNumber, a.show_room_enable showRoomEnable, a.number_threshold numberThreshold, a.activity_rules activityRules, b.activity_type activityType, b.check_in_time checkInTime, b.check_in_period checkInPeriod, b.check_out_period checkOutPeriod, b.min_purchase_number minPurchaseNumber, c.category_id categoryId, c.category_name categoryName, c.room_id roomId, c.room_num roomNum, c.rack_rate rackRate, c.id, MIN(c.activity_price) activity_price, a.activity_name activityName FROM t_activity a JOIN t_activity_detail b ON a.id = b.activity_id LEFT JOIN t_activity_room c ON a.id = c.activity_id WHERE a.publish_status = 0 AND a.mark_modified = 0 AND a.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND c.mark_modified = 0 GROUP BY a.id
